text: Employees are entitled to 20 days of paid leave annually. Sick leave and vacation are included in this allocation.
Standard working hours are from 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday through Friday. Overtime is compensated as per company policy.
Employees may work remotely up to two days a week, subject to manager approval and team coordination.
All employees must adhere to the company's code of conduct, including respecting colleagues, maintaining confidentiality, and avoiding conflicts of interest.
